milestones.name: Problem-Solution Validation
milestones.description: Proving you've identified a real problem worth solving

requirements.name: Customer Discovery
requirements.description: Complete and document at least 25 interviews with potential users in your target market. These interviews should validate the problem exists and is painful enough that people would pay for a solution.

requirements.name: Problem Statement Whitepaper
requirements.description: Create a comprehensive document (at least 10 pages) that clearly defines the problem, analyzes the market size (TAM/SAM/SOM), and outlines your solution approach.

requirements.name: Community Interest
requirements.description: Demonstrate early interest by collecting at least 250 wallet addresses from potential users through your interest collection smart contract

milestones.name: Founder Commitment & Capability
milestones.description: Demonstrating your team has the skills and commitment to execute

requirements.name: Core Team Credentials
requirements.description: Verify the identities and qualifications of at least 2 core founders using verifiable credentials linked to established professional profiles.

requirements.name: Founder Token Lock-up
requirements.description: Deploy a token vesting contract that locks founder tokens for at least 2 years, demonstrating long-term commitment to the project.

requirements.name: Technical Capability Proof
requirements.description: Show your team's technical expertise through verifiable open-source contributions or previous project work (at least 500 commits).

milestones.name: Legal & Governance Foundation
milestones.description: Establishing the proper legal and governance structures

requirements.name: Business Entity Formation
requirements.description: Form a proper legal entity in a jurisdiction suitable for web3 operations (such as Switzerland, Singapore, Wyoming, Cayman Islands, or BVI).

requirements.name: Token Legal Opinion
requirements.description: Obtain and document a legal opinion regarding your token's classification and regulatory considerations from qualified legal counsel

requirements.name: Governance Framework
requirements.description: Deploy an initial governance structure (such as a multi-signature wallet) that requires at least 3 signers with a minimum of 2 signatures for transactions.

milestones.name: Token Economics Blueprint
milestones.description: Creating a sustainable economic model for your project

requirements.name: Token Distribution Model
requirements.description: Design a comprehensive tokenomics model including allocation percentages, vesting schedules, and distribution mechanisms

requirements.name: Token Utility Architecture
requirements.description: Create a detailed specification of at least 3 distinct ways your token will be used within your ecosystem.

requirements.name: Economic Simulation
requirements.description: Develop a simulation demonstrating how your token economy functions under various usage scenarios and market conditions.

milestones.name: Technical Prototype Development
milestones.description: Building the first working version of your product

requirements.name: Smart Contract Repository
requirements.description: Develop the core smart contracts for your product with at least 80% test coverage, incorporating standard token implementations, access controls, and upgradability patterns.

requirements.name: Testnet Deployment
requirements.description: Deploy your core contracts to at least one testnet (Sepolia, Mumbai, Fuji, or Arbitrum Goerli) with verified contract code.

requirements.name: UI Prototype
requirements.description: Create an interactive front-end prototype that connects to crypto wallets and can interact with your testnet contracts.

requirements.name: Technical Architecture
requirements.description: Document your system's architecture including contract interactions, data flows, and security model.

milestones.name: Security & Testing Foundation
milestones.description: Ensuring your product is secure and reliable

requirements.name: Formal Verification Plan
requirements.description: Develop a comprehensive security strategy including threat modeling and formal verification approaches.

requirements.name: Automated Testing
requirements.description: Implement a test suite with at least 85% coverage and 100+ test assertions to validate functionality.

requirements.name: Security Review
requirements.description: Obtain an initial security assessment from a qualified security researcher with verifiable credentials.

requirements.name: Community Platform
requirements.description: Establish an active community platform (Discord/Telegram) with at least 500 members, proper moderation, and educational resources.

requirements.name: Content Library
requirements.description: Create at least 5 pieces of educational content explaining your project's value proposition and technology.

requirements.name: Strategic Partnership
requirements.description: Formalize at least one partnership with a relevant ecosystem player, verified through cryptographic signatures.

requirements.name: Regulatory Compliance Assessment
requirements.description: Complete a thorough analysis of applicable regulations and develop a compliance strategy.

requirements.name: KYC/AML Implementation Plan
requirements.description: If conducting a token sale, develop a plan for implementing appropriate identity verification procedures.

requirements.name: Data Protection Framework
requirements.description: Create a framework ensuring compliance with relevant data protection regulations for any off-chain data.

requirements.name: Smart Contract Audit
requirements.description: Complete a security audit from a reputable auditing firm such as OpenZeppelin, CertiK, ConsenSys Diligence, Trail of Bits, or Quantstamp.

requirements.name: Economic Audit
requirements.description: Obtain a review of your token economics from specialists in economic and game theory.

requirements.name: Staging Environment
requirements.description: Deploy your complete product to a staging environment with all core features implemented.

requirements.name: Deployment Procedures
requirements.description: Document detailed deployment processes and emergency response plans.

requirements.name: Core Feature Completion
requirements.description: Implement at least 95% of specified core features for your MVP.

requirements.name: Structured User Testing
requirements.description: Conduct comprehensive testing with at least 30 users and document their feedback.

requirements.name: Technical Documentation
requirements.description: Create thorough documentation for users, developers, and potential integrators.

milestones.name: User Acquisition Readiness
milestones.description: Preparing to attract and retain users

requirements.name: User Acquisition Strategy
requirements.description: Develop a detailed growth strategy with specific channels, tactics, and success metrics.

requirements.name: Analytics Implementation
requirements.description: Implement both on-chain and off-chain analytics to track user behavior and key metrics.

requirements.name: User Incentive Program
requirements.description: Deploy smart contracts for rewarding early adopters and incentivizing product usage.

requirements.name: Governance Framework Specification
requirements.description: Document your governance processes including proposal submission, voting, and implementation.

requirements.name: Governance Contracts
requirements.description: Deploy the smart contracts that will enable your governance system.

requirements.name: Community Tools
requirements.description: Create interfaces and tools that allow community members to participate in governance.

requirements.name: Full Mainnet Deployment
requirements.description: Deploy your complete product to mainnet with verified contract code.

requirements.name: Security Monitoring
requirements.description: Implement systems for monitoring contract activity and detecting potential threats.

requirements.name: Launch Campaign
requirements.description: Execute a coordinated launch campaign across multiple channels.

requirements.name: Initial User Onboarding
requirements.description: Successfully onboard your first cohort of users to the platform.

requirements.name: User Acquisition Metrics
requirements.description: Achieve at least 1,000 registered users with a 20% month-over-month growth rate.

requirements.name: Usage Metrics
requirements.description: Demonstrate active usage with key metrics exceeding industry benchmarks.

requirements.name: User Feedback Integration
requirements.description: Implement a system for collecting and acting on user feedback.

requirements.name: Revenue Generation
requirements.description: Implement and validate your revenue model with initial paying customers.

requirements.name: Token Economy Activation
requirements.description: Demonstrate active usage of your token for its intended utilities.

requirements.name: Sustainability Metrics
requirements.description: Show positive trends in key sustainability metrics like retention and engagement.

requirements.name: Developer Tools
requirements.description: Create tools and documentation to enable third-party developers.

requirements.name: Integration Partnerships
requirements.description: Establish at least three integration partnerships with complementary projects.

requirements.name: Community-Led Initiatives
requirements.description: Successfully transition at least two initiatives to community leadership.
